group_1.textRight: Is she unconscious? What did you do to her?!

group_1.textLeft: I'm a little taken aback by the accusing@tone in your voice right now, but anyway...
She just fainted after using her Doppel.
More importantly, I, Alina, have a buona idea.

group_1.narration: I was barely conscious,@but Mifuyu and Alina's conversation@filtered dimly into my awareness.

group_1.textRight: I have a bad feeling about this.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* [chara:100701:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:100701:cheek_0][chara:100701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100701:lipSynch_1]Oh, don't be like that. Let's hear@her out.

group_1.textRight: Right. There is no harm in lending an ear@to her.
You're late.

group_1.textLeft: We have business of our own, you know!
Hmmm?
Isn't that Mitakihara's famous veteran just@snoozing away over there?

group_1.textRight: Apparently the talk about her incredible@skills was quite exaggerated.
No... She's very strong.
I would've been in real trouble if Alina@hadn't shown up.

group_1.textLeft: And then, after that, she almost killed my@adorable Witch...
Aaauuuggghhh! And I am MOLTO angry about@that!!!
So in the end, she was no match for Alina's@pet Witch?

group_1.textRight: No, it's just the backlash from unleashing@her Doppel for the first time...
It looks like she can't move.

group_1.textLeft: I see. She could prove useful as a soldier@for our cause.
The only thing is...
She didn't sympathize with our goals.
Isn't that right?

group_1.textRight: No. The problem is even more severe.
She couldn't handle the truth about how we@will all become Witches...
She had a much stronger reaction to it@than any of the other Magical Girls.
In other words, she couldn't take it and had@a little bit of a nervous breakdown.

group_1.textLeft: That's such a shame, considering how powerful@she apparently is.
So, Alina?
Isn't it time for your "buona idea" to make@its appearance?

group_1.textRight: Aha!
If it's her mind that's the problem, we can@just use her powers.
But the brainwashing didn't work...

group_1.textLeft: That's too soft a technique.
We'll rewrite "Mami Tomoe" completely.

group_1.textRight: What are you suggesting?

group_1.textLeft: It's too bad I couldn't feed her to my Witch,@but now I can at least feed her to an [textBlue:Uwasa].
You're talking about fusing a human with an@[textBlue:Uwasa]?

group_1.textRight: I think it's a molta buona idea.
You CAN do it, right?

group_1.textLeft: Heh. That really is a fascinating idea.
It would be the first time this is attempted,@but I agree. It is not impossible.
...Yes. I thought of the perfect [textBlue:Rumor] for@her.
*Giggle* I'm on board too!
It'd be such a waste to throw her out now.
Let's pool our resources and make best use@of her!

group_1.textRight: Wait!
Don't you think that's an inhumane thing to@do to her?

group_1.textLeft: But if we let her go, she'll just get in our@way.
Who knows, she might attack other Magical@Girls!

group_1.textRight: That's...well...

group_1.textCenter: We'll transform Mami Tomoe into the [textBlue:Rumor]@of a saint.

group_1.narration: So they fused me with a [textBlue:Rumor].
But in the beginning, I still had@my human consciousness...
